snippet: Undeterred by intense cross-examination, Mostafa Kamel Mostafa tried to question the prosecutor and continued to deny all charges against him during his trial in Lower Manhattan.
abstract: British cleric Mostafa Kamel Mostafa, under prosecutor's rigorous cross-examination, turns combative and continues to deny all terrorism-related charges against him during his trial in Lower Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: Undeterred by intense cross-examination, Mostafa Kamel Mostafa tried to question the prosecutor and continued to deny all charges against him during his trial in Lower Manhattan.

headline.main: Cleric Spars With Prosecutor at Terror Trial
headline.print_headline: Cleric Spars With Prosecutor at Terror Trial
